source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic, first-person view from a drone flying low and fast over a landscape. The camera skims across a vibrant green field, following two parallel dirt tracks that lead up a gentle slope. At the top of the hill is a dense forest under a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic, first-person view from a drone flying low and fast over a landscape. The camera skims across a vibrant green field, following two parallel dirt tracks that lead up a gentle slope. At the top of the hill is a dense forest under a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds.

bad_caption: A cyclist pedals along a busy city street, weaving between cars and stopping briefly at a traffic light. After the light turns green, the cyclist turns sharply onto a bridge, passing several pedestrians walking in the opposite direction. In the distance, tall skyscrapers are visible under an overcast sky.
